text: (jnapakam cesukondi!) Ayana (allah), tana taraphu nundi miku manassanti kalugajeyataniki miku nidramattunu kaligincadu mariyu mipai akasam nundi nitini kuripincadu, dani dvara mim'malni parisud'dhaparacataniki mi nundi saitan malin'yanni duram ceyataniki mariyu mi hrdayalanu balaparacataniki mariyu mi padalanu sthiraparacataniki
